name: CityGA
description:
Exciting city building without the need for an expensive and finicky VGA graphics adapter! Build zones and let the population count get rolling! Use the processing power of your mind to envision the grand skyline of your fantastic creation!

Features:

  • Exciting CGA Color Graphics!
  • Endless gameplay!
  • PC-Speaker Sound!
  • Real-time Supply/Demand Algorithmic Logic (RTSDAL™)

Created for CitySimJam 2016
